description:
Learn more about the technology → https://ibm.biz/BdmH9K

There are 4 common data storage purchasing options that have a significant influence on total cost of ownership. Hear Audrey O'Donnell give an overview of common options and share 5 considerations for choosing between options to ensure you optimize accordingly. 
​
Keep up with the next era of hybrid multicloud solutions through the latest news, tools and thought leadership → https://ibm.biz/BdmH9G
title: Storage Lifescycle Explained
